ud2.4:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud2.4:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava sakkato hoti garukato manito pujito apacito, labhi civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
ud2.4:1.4: Bhikkhusanghopi sakkato hoti garukato manito pujito apacito, labhi civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
ud2.4:1.5: Annatitthiya pana paribbajaka asakkata honti agarukata amanita apujita anapacita, na labhino civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
ud2.4:1.6: Atha kho te annatitthiya paribbajaka bhagavato sakkaram asahamana bhikkhusanghassa ca, game ca aranne ca bhikkhu disva asabbhahi pharusahi vacahi akkosanti paribhasanti rosenti vihesenti.
ud2.4:2.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu. Ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
ud2.4:2.2: “etarahi, bhante, bhagava sakkato garukato manito pujito apacito, labhi civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
ud2.4:2.3: Bhikkhusanghopi sakkato garukato manito pujito apacito, labhi civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
ud2.4:2.4: Annatitthiya pana paribbajaka asakkata agarukata amanita apujita anapacita, na labhino civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
ud2.4:2.5: Atha kho te, bhante, annatitthiya paribbajaka bhagavato sakkaram asahamana bhikkhusanghassa ca, game ca aranne ca bhikkhu disva asabbhahi pharusahi vacahi akkosanti paribhasanti rosenti vihesanti”ti.
ud2.4:3.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
